snippet: State regulators said Duke Energy, a utility already under a federal investigation for pollution, may have illegally released wastewater last week from a second site near of Raleigh.
abstract: State regulators in North Carolina say Duke Energy, utility already under federal investigation for water pollution, may have illegally released wastewater from second site near of Raleigh.
lead_paragraph: State regulators said Duke Energy, a utility already under a federal investigation for pollution, may have illegally released wastewater last week from a second site near of Raleigh.

headline.main: Questions as More Wastewater Flows in North Carolina
headline.print_headline: Questions as More Wastewater Flows in North Carolina
